017package org.spongepowered.configurate.jackson;
018
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonFactory;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonFactoryBuilder;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonToken;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.json.JsonReadFeature;
026import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList;
027import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
028import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
029import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
030import org.spongepowered.configurate.BasicConfigurationNode;
031import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
032import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationOptions;
033import org.spongepowered.configurate.loader.AbstractConfigurationLoader;
034import org.spongepowered.configurate.loader.CommentHandler;
035import org.spongepowered.configurate.loader.CommentHandlers;
036
037import java.io.BufferedReader;
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.io.Writer;
040import java.util.List;
041import java.util.Map;
042
043/**
044 * A loader for JSON-formatted configurations, using the jackson library for parsing and generation.
045 */
046public class JacksonConfigurationLoader extends AbstractConfigurationLoader<BasicConfigurationNode> {
047
048    /**
049     * Creates a new {@link JacksonConfigurationLoader} builder.
050     *
051     * @return A new builder
052     */
053    @NonNull
054    public static Builder builder() {
055        return new Builder();
056    }
057
058    /**
059     * Builds a {@link JacksonConfigurationLoader}.
060     */
061    public static class Builder extends AbstractConfigurationLoader.Builder<Builder> {
062        private final JsonFactoryBuilder factory = new JsonFactoryBuilder();
063        private int indent = 2;
064        private FieldValueSeparatorStyle fieldValueSeparatorStyle = FieldValueSeparatorStyle.SPACE_AFTER;
065
066        protected Builder() {
067            factory.enable(JsonReadFeature.ALLOW_JAVA_COMMENTS);
068            factory.enable(JsonReadFeature.ALLOW_YAML_COMMENTS);
069            factory.enable(JsonReadFeature.ALLOW_BACKSLASH_ESCAPING_ANY_CHARACTER);
070            factory.enable(JsonReadFeature.ALLOW_UNQUOTED_FIELD_NAMES);
071            factory.enable(JsonReadFeature.ALLOW_SINGLE_QUOTES);
072            factory.enable(JsonReadFeature.ALLOW_NON_NUMERIC_NUMBERS);
073            factory.enable(JsonReadFeature.ALLOW_UNESCAPED_CONTROL_CHARS);
074        }
075
076        /**
077         * Gets the {@link JsonFactory} used to configure the implementation.
078         *
079         * @return The json factory
080         */
081        @NonNull
082        public JsonFactoryBuilder getFactoryBuilder() {
083            return this.factory;
084        }
085
086        /**
087         * Sets the level of indentation the resultant loader should use.
088         *
089         * @param indent The indent level
090         * @return This builder (for chaining)
091         */
092        @NonNull
093        public Builder setIndent(int indent) {
094            this.indent = indent;
095            return this;
096        }
097
098        /**
099         * Gets the level of indentation to be used by the resultant loader.
100         *
101         * @return The indent level
102         */
103        public int getIndent() {
104            return this.indent;
105        }
106
107        /**
108         * Sets the field value separator style the resultant loader should use.
109         *
110         * @param style The style
111         * @return  This builder (for chaining)
112         */
113        @NonNull
114        public Builder setFieldValueSeparatorStyle(@NonNull FieldValueSeparatorStyle style) {
115            this.fieldValueSeparatorStyle = style;
116            return this;
117        }
118
119        /**
120         * Gets the field value separator style to be used by the resultant loader.
121         *
122         * @return The style
123         */
124        @NonNull
125        public FieldValueSeparatorStyle getFieldValueSeparatorStyle() {
126            return fieldValueSeparatorStyle;
127        }
128
129        @NonNull
130        @Override
131        public JacksonConfigurationLoader build() {
132            return new JacksonConfigurationLoader(this);
133        }
134    }
135
136    private final JsonFactory factory;
137    private final int indent;
138    private final FieldValueSeparatorStyle fieldValueSeparatorStyle;
139
140    private JacksonConfigurationLoader(Builder builder) {
141        super(builder, new CommentHandler[]{CommentHandlers.DOUBLE_SLASH, CommentHandlers.SLASH_BLOCK, CommentHandlers.HASH});
142        this.factory = builder.getFactoryBuilder().build();
143        this.factory.disable(JsonParser.Feature.AUTO_CLOSE_SOURCE);
144        this.indent = builder.getIndent();
145        this.fieldValueSeparatorStyle = builder.getFieldValueSeparatorStyle();
146    }
147
148    @Override
149    protected void loadInternal(BasicConfigurationNode node, BufferedReader reader) throws IOException {
150        try (JsonParser parser = factory.createParser(reader)) {
151            parser.nextToken();
152            parseValue(parser, node);
153        }
154    }
155
156    private static void parseValue(JsonParser parser, ConfigurationNode node) throws IOException {
157        JsonToken token = parser.getCurrentToken();
158        switch (token) {
159            case START_OBJECT:
160                parseObject(parser, node);
161                break;
162            case START_ARRAY:
163                parseArray(parser, node);
164                break;
165            case VALUE_NUMBER_FLOAT:
166                double doubleVal = parser.getDoubleValue();
167                if ((float)doubleVal != doubleVal) {
168                    node.setValue(parser.getDoubleValue());
169                } else {
170                    node.setValue(parser.getFloatValue());
171                }
172                break;
173            case VALUE_NUMBER_INT:
174                long longVal = parser.getLongValue();
175                if ((int)longVal != longVal) {
176                    node.setValue(parser.getLongValue());
177                } else {
178                    node.setValue(parser.getIntValue());
179                }
180                break;
181            case VALUE_STRING:
182                node.setValue(parser.getText());
183                break;
184            case VALUE_TRUE:
185            case VALUE_FALSE:
186                node.setValue(parser.getBooleanValue());
187                break;
188            case VALUE_NULL: // Ignored values
189            case FIELD_NAME:
190                break;
191            default:
192                throw new IOException("Unsupported token type: " + token + " (at " + parser.getTokenLocation() + ")");
193        }
194    }
195
196    private static void parseArray(JsonParser parser, ConfigurationNode node) throws IOException {
197        boolean written = false;
198        JsonToken token;
199        while ((token = parser.nextToken()) != null) {
200            switch (token) {
201                case END_ARRAY:
202                    // ensure the type is preserved
203                    if (!written) {
204                        node.setValue(ImmutableList.of());
205                    }
206                    return;
207                default:
208                    parseValue(parser, node.appendListNode());
209                    written = true;
210            }
211        }
212        throw new JsonParseException(parser, "Reached end of stream with unclosed array!", parser.getCurrentLocation());
213    }
214
215    private static void parseObject(JsonParser parser, ConfigurationNode node) throws IOException {
216        boolean written = false;
217        JsonToken token;
218        while ((token = parser.nextToken()) != null) {
219            switch (token) {
220                case END_OBJECT:
221                    // ensure the type is preserved
222                    if (!written) {
223                        node.setValue(ImmutableMap.of());
224                    }
225                    return;
226                default:
227                    parseValue(parser, node.getNode(parser.getCurrentName()));
228                    written = true;
229            }
230        }
231        throw new JsonParseException(parser, "Reached end of stream with unclosed array!", parser.getCurrentLocation());
232    }
233
234    @Override
235    public void saveInternal(ConfigurationNode node, Writer writer) throws IOException {
236        try (JsonGenerator generator = factory.createGenerator(writer)) {
237            generator.setPrettyPrinter(new ConfiguratePrettyPrinter(indent, fieldValueSeparatorStyle));
238            JacksonVisitor.INSTANCE.visit(node, generator);
239            writer.write(SYSTEM_LINE_SEPARATOR); // Jackson doesn't add a newline at the end of files by default
240        }
241    }
242
243    @NonNull
244    @Override
245    public BasicConfigurationNode createEmptyNode(@NonNull ConfigurationOptions options) {
246        options = options.withAcceptedTypes(ImmutableSet.of(Map.class, List.class, Double.class, Float.class,
247                Long.class, Integer.class, Boolean.class, String.class, byte[].class));
248        return BasicConfigurationNode.root(options);
249    }
250}
